moves.2... c5: Hmm, this is the symmetrical (Austrian) defense. I don't play against it often.
moves.6... b5 7. a4 b4 8. Nb5: A nice outpost for my knight.
moves.12... Kd7 13. Be8+: !! If he takes my bishop then I take his queen after which I fork his king and rook! If he moves his queen then I take his queen with my bishop.
moves.13... Kxe8: ?? Fall into it, now I win his queen for free.
moves.15... Kd7 16. Nxa8: After that combination I'm ahead by eight points.
moves.16... Bf5 17. O-O Bd3: ! Puts his bishop in a nice spot. Although his game is lost already.
moves.18. Re1 e6 19. Qxb3: I prepare to finish him off.
....And checkmate! Please drop a comment and rate.
